page.title: 09The County Showground.
page.content: The County Showground is owned by the Staffordshire Agricultural Society which was formed in 1799.Lots of different events take place during the year including the Spring Garden Show, County Show,Antique Fairs,Country Festival,Ideal Home Exibition and a Space Carnival for children held by the police. There are also various shows for cattle,horses,ponies and dogs.Sometimes there are major concerts.The main buildings are Bingley Hall,the Grandstand and Show ring,the Ingestre suite and offices.The area covers 100 acres. At the showground there are lots of catering facilities-6 bars,4 cafeterias and the Ingestre Room which can hold 400 people.
